bill.title: 2023-24 Long Bill
bill.description: Concerning the provision for payment of the expenses of the executive, legislative, and judicial departments of the state of Colorado, and of its agencies and institutions, for and during the fiscal year beginning July 1, 2023, except as otherwise noted.

history.action: Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Unamended to Senate Committee of the Whole

Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments

House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Senate Considered House Amendments - Result was to Not Concur - Request Conference Committee
First Conference Committee Result was to Adopt Reengrossed w/ Amendments
House Consideration of First Conference Committee Report result was to Adopt Committee Report - Repass
Senate Consideration of First Conference Committee Report result was to Adopt Committee Report - Repass
Signed by the President of the Senate
Signed by the Speaker of the House

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Include in the report an amendment to add a one-time $2.0 million General Fund appropriation related to the Victims and Witness Assistance and Law Enforcement Fund in the Judicial Department (Section 24-4.2-103(1), C.R.S.).

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Include in the report an amendment to add appropriations for the following capital IT projects: (1) JTC priority #18 Revenue Licensing and Case Management Software [$1,000,000 General Fund transfer for FY 2023-24] (2) JTC priority #21 C

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Include in the report an amendment to add appropriations for the following capital construction projects: (1) CDC priority #13/OSPB priority #9 DOC Sterling Access Controls Electronic Security System Replacement phase ½ [$9,396,262 Gene

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Include in the report an amendment to make a one-time appropriation of $10.0 million General Fund to the Reinsurance Program Cash Fund in the Department of Regulatory Agencies (Section 10-16-1107(1)(a), C.R.S.).

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Include in the report an amendment to shift cash fund appropriations to the Department of State from the business intelligence center line item to the personal services line items in the administration, elections, and business and licen

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Include in the report the 28 amendments recommended by JBC staff to make technical and other corrections to the Long Bill, as described in the memorandum from Director Kampman dated April 12, 2023.
CC_SB23-214_2023A: Prepare the conference committee report of the first conference committee on the Long Bill based on the prior motions.

CC_SB23-214_2023A: Reject Senate Amendment #1 which adds a footnote in the Department of Corrections that indicates the General Assembly's intent that the Department use the existing appropriation to pay for any harassment-related settlements.
